metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28805 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: singlevar in lparser.c in Lua from (including) 5.4.0 up to (excluding)5.4.4 lacks a certain luaK_exp2anyregup call, leading to a heap-basedbuffer over-read that might affect a system that compiles untrusted Luacode.

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
lua5.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
lua5.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
